name: FUCK U DNT STEAL THIS RECIPE BITCH
description: Made on LiveMixing Ep. 12/16/16. This is my take on a White Chocolate Peppermint Bark. Thank and dont steal this recipe or sell it for profit or my Goons will fuck you in your loose butthole....bitch.
author: ENYAWREKLAW

reviews.text: yup tastes like peppermint bark alright. great recipe. keep in mind that it doesnt steep too well after a month or two though-the peppermint dies out a bit.

Could be better but I took that shit anyway. Sold a gallon this morning and its headed for a undisclosed location. The FDA assures me its fine and James Comey said don't use FW white chocolate til after the election. Think I'll go with FDA on this one.
Just mixed this up, it is good as hell. Very nice. I was thinking of giving this a try and you beat me to the punch. It's so good I ain't even mad haha.
